title: Bug 116744 Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The bug report does not provide sufficient details about the issue.
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the expected behavior is not observed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a dynamic text element.
2. Set the dynamic text element to display the contents of the mentioned database field.
3. Ensure that the database field contains all three types of content.
4. Verify that the dynamic text element does not render the content correctly based on its respective content type.
